channel.title: Posts on Nick's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Nick's Blog

item.title: Hello (again) World
item.description: I finally decided to resurrect my old website - I am still paying for the domain after all. Since my last update, I’ve: Lived and worked on the other side of the planet Changed cities Picked up another degree Started a new job I’m not sure how regularly I’ll write here, but I thought I might like to start sharing some projects again.
